body.query: source = {{index_name | default('clickbench')}} | stats count()
source = {{index_name | default('clickbench')}} | where AdvEngineID!=0 | stats count()
source = {{index_name | default('clickbench')}} | stats sum(AdvEngineID), count(), avg(ResolutionWidth)
source = {{index_name | default('clickbench')}} | stats avg(UserID)
source = {{index_name | default('clickbench')}} | stats dc(UserID)
source = {{index_name | default('clickbench')}} | stats dc(SearchPhrase)
source = {{index_name | default('clickbench')}} | stats min(EventDate), max(EventDate)
source = {{index_name | default('clickbench')}} | where AdvEngineID!=0 | stats count() by AdvEngineID | sort - `count()`
source = {{index_name | default('clickbench')}} | stats dc(UserID) as u by RegionID | sort -u | head 10
source = {{index_name | default('clickbench')}} | stats sum(AdvEngineID), count() as c, avg(ResolutionWidth), dc(UserID) by RegionID | sort - c | head 10
source = {{index_name | default('clickbench')}} | where MobilePhoneModel != '' | stats dc(UserID) as u by MobilePhoneModel | sort - u | head 10
source = {{index_name | default('clickbench')}} | where MobilePhoneModel != '' | stats dc(UserID) as u by MobilePhone, MobilePhoneModel | sort - u | head 10
source = {{index_name | default('clickbench')}} | where SearchPhrase != '' | stats count() as c by SearchPhrase | sort - c | head 10
source = {{index_name | default('clickbench')}} | where SearchPhrase != '' | stats dc(UserID) as u by SearchPhrase | sort - u | head 10
source = {{index_name | default('clickbench')}} | where SearchPhrase != '' | stats count() as c by SearchEngineID, SearchPhrase | sort - c | head 10
source = {{index_name | default('clickbench')}} | stats count() by UserID | sort - `count()` | head 10
source = {{index_name | default('clickbench')}} | stats count() by UserID, SearchPhrase | sort - `count()` | head 10
source = {{index_name | default('clickbench')}} | stats count() by UserID, SearchPhrase | head 10
source = {{index_name | default('clickbench')}} | eval m = extract(minute from EventTime) | stats count() by UserID, m, SearchPhrase | sort - `count()` | head 10
source = {{index_name | default('clickbench')}} | where UserID = 435090932899640449 | fields UserID
source = {{index_name | default('clickbench')}} | where like(URL, '%google%') | stats count()
source = {{index_name | default('clickbench')}} | where like(URL, '%google%') and SearchPhrase != '' | stats count() as c by SearchPhrase | sort - c | head 10

source = {{index_name | default('clickbench')}} | where like(Title, '%Google%') and not like(URL, '%.google.%') and SearchPhrase != '' | stats count() as c, dc(UserID) by SearchPhrase | sort - c | head 10
source = {{index_name | default('clickbench')}} | where like(URL, '%google%') | sort EventTime | head 10
source = {{index_name | default('clickbench')}} | where SearchPhrase != '' | sort EventTime | fields SearchPhrase | head 10
source = {{index_name | default('clickbench')}} | where SearchPhrase != '' | fields SearchPhrase | sort SearchPhrase | head 10
source = {{index_name | default('clickbench')}} | where SearchPhrase != '' | sort EventTime, SearchPhrase | fields SearchPhrase | head 10
source = {{index_name | default('clickbench')}} | where URL != '' | stats avg(length(URL)) as l, count() as c by CounterID | where c > 100000 | sort - l | head 25

source = {{index_name | default('clickbench')}} | Referer != '' | eval k = regexp_replace(Referer, '^https?://(?:www\.)?([^/]+)/.*$', '\1') | stats avg(length(Referer)) as l, count() as c, min(Referer) by k | where c > 100000 | sort - l | head 25

source = {{index_name | default('clickbench')}} | stats sum(ResolutionWidth), sum(ResolutionWidth+1), sum(ResolutionWidth+2), sum(ResolutionWidth+3), sum(ResolutionWidth+4), sum(ResolutionWidth+5), sum(ResolutionWidth+6), sum(ResolutionWidth+7), sum(ResolutionWidth+8), sum(ResolutionWidth+9)
source = {{index_name | default('clickbench')}} | where SearchPhrase != '' | stats count() as c, sum(IsRefresh), avg(ResolutionWidth) by SearchEngineID, ClientIP | sort - c | head 10
source = {{index_name | default('clickbench')}} | where SearchPhrase != '' | stats count() as c, sum(IsRefresh), avg(ResolutionWidth) by WatchID, ClientIP | sort - c | head 10
source = {{index_name | default('clickbench')}} | stats count() as c, sum(IsRefresh), avg(ResolutionWidth) by WatchID, ClientIP | sort - c | head 10
source = {{index_name | default('clickbench')}} | stats count() as c by URL | sort - c | head 10
source = {{index_name | default('clickbench')}} | eval const = 1 | stats count() as c by const, URL | sort - c | head 10

source = {{index_name | default('clickbench')}} | eval `ClientIP - 1` = ClientIP - 1, `ClientIP - 2` = ClientIP - 2, `ClientIP - 3` = ClientIP - 3 | stats count() as c by ClientIP, `ClientIP - 1`, `ClientIP - 2`, `ClientIP - 3` | sort - c | head 10

source = {{index_name | default('clickbench')}} | where CounterID = 62 and EventDate >= '2013-07-01 00:00:00' and EventDate <= '2013-07-31 00:00:00' and DontCountHits = 0 and IsRefresh = 0 and URL != '' | stats count() as PageViews by URL | sort - PageViews | head 10

source = {{index_name | default('clickbench')}} | where CounterID = 62 and EventDate >= '2013-07-01 00:00:00' and EventDate <= '2013-07-31 00:00:00' and DontCountHits = 0 and IsRefresh = 0 and Title != '' | stats count() as PageViews by Title | sort - PageViews | head 10

source = {{index_name | default('clickbench')}} | where CounterID = 62 and EventDate >= '2013-07-01 00:00:00' and EventDate <= '2013-07-31 00:00:00' and IsRefresh = 0 and IsLink != 0 and IsDownload = 0 | stats count() as PageViews by URL | sort - PageViews | head 10 from 1000

source = {{index_name | default('clickbench')}} | where CounterID = 62 and EventDate >= '2013-07-01 00:00:00' and EventDate <= '2013-07-31 00:00:00' and IsRefresh = 0 | eval Src=case(SearchEngineID = 0 and AdvEngineID = 0, Referer else ''), Dst=URL | stats count() as PageViews by TraficSourceID, SearchEngineID, AdvEngineID, Src, Dst | sort - PageViews | head 10 from 1000

source = {{index_name | default('clickbench')}} | where CounterID = 62 and EventDate >= '2013-07-01 00:00:00' and EventDate <= '2013-07-31 00:00:00' and IsRefresh = 0 and TraficSourceID in (-1, 6) and RefererHash = 3594120000172545465 | stats count() as PageViews by URLHash, EventDate | sort - PageViews | head 10 from 100

source = {{index_name | default('clickbench')}} | where CounterID = 62 and EventDate >= '2013-07-01 00:00:00' and EventDate <= '2013-07-31 00:00:00' and IsRefresh = 0 and DontCountHits = 0 and URLHash = 2868770270353813622 | stats count() as PageViews by WindowClientWidth, WindowClientHeight | sort - PageViews | head 10 from 10000

source = {{index_name | default('clickbench')}} | where CounterID = 62 and EventDate >= '2013-07-01 00:00:00' and EventDate <= '2013-07-15 00:00:00' and IsRefresh = 0 and DontCountHits = 0 | eval M = date_format(EventTime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:00:00') | stats count() as PageViews by M | sort M | head 10 from 1000
